PackageOracle.name: DA_PROGRAM
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_PROGRAM
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.12.842174000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,title_id IN NUMBER
,high_definition_ind IN VARCHAR2
,rating_cd IN VARCHAR2
,consumption_method_cd IN VARCHAR2
,version_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,title_id IN NUMBER
,high_definition_ind IN VARCHAR2
,rating_cd IN VARCHAR2
,consumption_method_cd IN VARCHAR2
,version_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,program_product_id IN NUMBER
,title_id IN NUMBER
,high_definition_ind IN VARCHAR2
,rating_cd IN VARCHAR2
,consumption_method_cd IN VARCHAR2
,version_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,program_product_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_program;

body.name: DA_PROGRAM
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_PROGRAM
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.12.853297000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,title_id IN NUMBER
,high_definition_ind IN VARCHAR2
,rating_cd IN VARCHAR2
,consumption_method_cd IN VARCHAR2
,version_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_program.add(fx), parms=' || title_id || '|' || high_definition_ind || '|' || rating_cd || '|' || consumption_method_cd || '|' || version_desc || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_program a
(
a.program_product_id
,a.title_id
,a.high_definition_ind
,a.rating_cd
,a.consumption_method_cd
,a.version_desc
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_program_product_id.NEXTVAL
,add.title_id
,add.high_definition_ind
,add.rating_cd
,add.consumption_method_cd
,add.version_desc
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.program_product_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_program.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,title_id IN NUMBER
,high_definition_ind IN VARCHAR2
,rating_cd IN VARCHAR2
,consumption_method_cd IN VARCHAR2
,version_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_program.add, parms=' || title_id || '|' || high_definition_ind || '|' || rating_cd || '|' || consumption_method_cd || '|' || version_desc || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_program a
(
a.program_product_id
,a.title_id
,a.high_definition_ind
,a.rating_cd
,a.consumption_method_cd
,a.version_desc
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_program_product_id.NEXTVAL
,add.title_id
,add.high_definition_ind
,add.rating_cd
,add.consumption_method_cd
,add.version_desc
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_program.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,program_product_id IN NUMBER
,title_id IN NUMBER
,high_definition_ind IN VARCHAR2
,rating_cd IN VARCHAR2
,consumption_method_cd IN VARCHAR2
,version_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_program.add, parms=' || program_product_id || '|' || title_id || '|' || high_definition_ind || '|' || rating_cd || '|' || consumption_method_cd || '|' || version_desc || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_program a
(
a.program_product_id
,a.title_id
,a.high_definition_ind
,a.rating_cd
,a.consumption_method_cd
,a.version_desc
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.program_product_id
,add.title_id
,add.high_definition_ind
,add.rating_cd
,add.consumption_method_cd
,add.version_desc
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_program.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,program_product_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_program.del, parms=' || program_product_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_program a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.program_product_id = del.program_product_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_program.del');

END del;

END da_program;
